title: 多媒体技术在学生深层次学习能力测验中的应用
excerpt: 深层次学习鼓励学生主动参与知识的探索与产生, 深层次学习能力测验考查学生的认知加工过程是否正确合理, 该类型测验常因题型缺乏而未能较好实现. 本研究探讨了如何运用多媒体技术实现该类测验, 运用文献分析法介绍多种新题型, 为线上测验活动的设计, 开发工作提供参考 ...
authors: 王洪荣， 施秋萍 - 中国教育信息化: 高教职教

title: Early Instruction in Geography: An Exploration in the Ecology of Kindergarten and First-Grade Geography Education
excerpt: Abstract This article presents an introductory study of early-grade level geography education in terms of human ecology using accepted cognitive process and knowledge dimensions related to learning. The central question addressed is “at what cognitive process and  ...

title: Unique metadata schemas: A model for user-centric design of a performance support system
